One sunny morning, the world awoke to an extraordinary sight: the oceans had transformed into vibrant lemonade! The news spread like wildfire, and people rushed to the shores, cups in hand. Children splashed joyfully, their laughter mingling with the tangy scent of citrus. Scientists scrambled to explain the phenomenon, while entrepreneurs seized the moment, launching lemonade stands on every beach. As the day wore on, the skies darkened, and the lemonade began to bubble ominously. Suddenly, it erupted into a refreshing rain, drenching the land in sweetness. The world learned to cherish the magic of nature, but they also remembered to respect it.
